players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I find it strange that Charlie was the one to be targeted on the first night. Let's keep an eye on each other and try to uncover any suspicious behavior."

Diana: "Charlie's death is a great opportunity for us to discuss our strategies and figure out who might be the mafioso. Let's keep an eye on each other and see if we can uncover any suspicious behavior."
Bob: "I agree with Alice that we should keep a close eye on each other to ensure fair play in this game. Let's try to gather as much information as possible and share it openly with the group."
You: "Let's continue our efforts to uncover any suspicious behavior and ensure fair play in this game. If anyone notices anything unusual, please bring it up with the group as soon as possible."
Diana: "I think we should all be careful and keep an eye on each other, but I'm not sure if that's the best approach. We don't know who the mafioso is yet."
